languages.text: "Однажды, когда была юна. Среди приближенных Домин'Теодоры Висирь узрел змея, готовившегося впиться ядовитыми клыками в ее горло. Мне было велено того змея вычислить. И отсечь душу от тела. Я наблюдала. Несколько недель из теней, воздуховодных шахт, толпы безликих слуг. И когда отыскала змею — отсекла ей голову и вернулась в храм. Не думаю, что Домин'Теодора видела меня. Но три ритуальных надреза ей подсказали, что смерть угодна Ему. В тот цикл с верхних палуб нам прислали множество яств. Мы раздали их голодающим".

"I met her once when I was young. The Vizsier saw a serpent hiding among those close to Domin'Theodora, ready to sink its fangs into her throat. I was ordered to find the serpent, and sever the soul from its body. I watched and waited for weeks. I hid among the shadows, the air ducts, and the faceless masses. Once I found the serpent, I sliced off its head and returned to the temple. I doubt that Domin'Theodora ever saw me. But the three ritual cuts I left behind on the body let her know that this death was pleasing to Him. They sent us a grand feast from the upper decks before the cycle's end. We gave it to the hungry."
languages.original_text: "Однажды, когда была юна. Среди приближенных Домин'Теодоры Висирь узрел змея, готовившегося впиться ядовитыми клыками в ее горло. Мне было велено того змея вычислить. И отсечь душу от тела. Я наблюдала. Несколько недель из теней, воздуховодных шахт, толпы безликих слуг. И когда отыскала змею — отсекла ей голову и вернулась в храм. traits.locale_text: "Once, when I was young. The Vizsier saw a serpent hiding in Enim'Theodora's circle, preparing to sink its fangs into her throat. My assignment was to expose the serpent and cut its soul from its body. I watched. For several weeks I melded with the shadows, the air ducts, the faceless throngs. Once I had found the serpent, I sliced its head off and returned to the temple. I doubt that Enim'Theodora ever saw me. But the three ritual cuts I had left told her that her confidant's death pleased Him. They sent us a grand feast from the upper decks before the cycle's end. We gave it to the starving."

But the three ritual cuts I had left told her that her confidant's death pleased Him. They sent us a grand feast from the upper decks before the cycle's end. We gave it to the starving."

languages.text: «La conocí una vez, cuando yo era joven. El Visir vislumbró una serpiente oculta entre el séquito personal de Domin'Theodora, a punto de hundirle los colmillos en la garganta. Me ordenaron que encontrase a esa serpiente y le separase el alma del cuerpo. Observé y aguardé durante semanas. Me escondí en las sombras, en los conductos de ventilación y entre la muchedumbre. Cuando encontré a la serpiente, le rebané la cabeza y volví al templo. Dudo que Domin'Theodora llegase a verme siquiera. Pero los tres cortes rituales que dejé en el cadáver le hicieron entender que su muerte era voluntad del Inmortal. Ella nos agasajó con un suntuoso banquete enviado desde las cubiertas superiores antes de que terminase el ciclo. Se lo dimos a los menesterosos».
languages.original_text: "I met her once when I was young. The Vizsier saw a serpent hiding among those close to Domin'Theodora, ready to sink its fangs into her throat. But the three ritual cuts I left behind on the body let her know that this death was pleasing to Him. They sent us a grand feast from the upper decks before the cycle's end. We gave it to the hungry."

languages.text: 「若いころ、一度だけ彼女に会ったことがあるわ。ヴィジールはドミン・シオドーラの近くに隠れていた蛇が、彼女の喉に牙を突き立てようとしているのを見た。私は蛇を見つけて、その肉体から魂を切り離せと命じられた。何週間も監視して待ったわ。物陰に、ダクトに、顔のない大衆に隠れた。蛇を見つけたとき、その首を切り落として寺院に戻ったの。ドミン・シオドーラが私を見たことはないはずよ。けれど、私が死体に残した3つの儀式の切り傷が、この死が主を喜ばせるものだと気づかせた。サイクルが終わる前に、上層デッキから盛大なごちそうを送ってくれたわ。私たちはそれを飢えた者たちに与えたの」
languages.original_text: "I met her once when I was young. The Vizsier saw a serpent hiding among those close to Domin'Theodora, ready to sink its fangs into her throat. I was ordered to find the serpent, and sever the soul from its body. I watched and waited for weeks. I hid among the shadows, the air ducts, and the faceless masses. Once I found the serpent, I sliced off its head and returned to the temple. I doubt that Domin'Theodora ever saw me. But the three ritual cuts I left behind on the body let her know that this death was pleasing to Him. They sent us a grand feast from the upper decks before the cycle's end. We gave it to the hungry."

traits.locale_text: 「若いころ、一度だけ彼女に会ったことがあるわ。ヴィジールはドミン・シオドーラの近くに隠れていた蛇が、彼女の喉に牙を突き立てようとしているのを見た。私は蛇を見つけて、その肉体から魂を切り離せと命じられた。何週間も監視して待ったわ。物陰に、ダクトに、顔のない大衆に隠れた。蛇を見つけたとき、その首を切り落として寺院に戻ったの。ドミン・シオドーラが私を見たことはないはずよ。けれど、私が死体に残した3つの儀式の切り傷が、この死が主を喜ばせるものだと気づかせた。サイクルが終わる前に、上層デッキから盛大なごちそうを送ってくれたわ。私たちはそれを飢えた者たちに与えたの」

languages.text: “我年轻的时候见过她一次。当时，宿老看到一条蛇隐藏在秘者西奥多拉身边的人群中，准备将毒牙刺入她的喉咙。我奉命去寻找那条毒蛇，将它的灵魂与躯体分离。我等了好几个星期，躲藏在阴影与通风管道里，混迹在没有面孔的人群之中。当我一找到那条蛇，就立刻砍掉了它的头，随后返回了圣殿。秘者西奥多拉可能从来没见过我，但我在尸体上留下了三个仪式的伤口，让她明白，毒蛇的死让不死神皇无比欣悦。那个周期结束之前，上层甲板的人给我们送来了慷慨的盛宴，而我们把食物分给了饥饿的人们。”
languages.original_text: "I met her once when I was young. The Vizsier saw a serpent hiding among those close to Domin'Theodora, ready to sink its fangs into her throat. I was ordered to find the serpent, and sever the soul from its body. I watched and waited for weeks. I hid among the shadows, the air ducts, and the faceless masses. Once I found the serpent, I sliced off its head and returned to the temple. I doubt that Domin'Theodora ever saw me. But the three ritual cuts I left behind on the body let her know that this death was pleasing to Him. They sent us a grand feast from the upper decks before the cycle's end. We gave it to the hungry."

languages.text: "Ich habe sie einmal getroffen, als ich noch jung war. Der Wesir sah eine Schlange im Umfeld von Domin'Theodora, die ihre Fänge in ihre Kehle schlagen wollte. Ich erhielt den Befehl, die Schlange zu finden und ihre Seele vom Körper zu trennen. Ich beobachtete und wartete wochenlang. Ich versteckte mich im Schatten, in den Lüftungssystemen und den gesichtslosen Massen. Als ich die Schlange schließlich fand, enthauptete ich sie und kehrte zum Tempel zurück. Ich bezweifle, dass Domin'Theodora mich jemals gesehen hat. Aber meine drei rituellen Schnitte an der Leiche teilten ihr mir, dass dieser Tod Seine Zustimmung hatte. Sie haben uns noch vor dem Ende des Zyklus ein großes Festmahl von den oberen Decks geschickt. Wir haben es den Hungrigen gegeben."
languages.original_text: "I met her once when I was young. The Vizsier saw a serpent hiding among those close to Domin'Theodora, ready to sink its fangs into her throat. languages.text: « Je l'ai croisée une fois, quand j'étais jeune. Le vizir a repéré dans l'entourage proche de Domin'Théodora un serpent qui s'apprêtait à lui sauter à la gorge. Il m'a ordonné de le démasquer et de séparer son âme de son corps. Des semaines durant, j'ai patiemment guetté le moment propice, tapie dans l'ombre, dans les conduites d'aération et dans l'anonymat des masses. Quand je l'ai trouvé, je lui ai tranché la tête avant de regagner discrètement le temple. Je doute que Domin'Théodora m'ait jamais vue, mais les trois entailles rituelles que j'ai laissées sur son cadavre ont suffi à lui faire comprendre que sa mort était conforme à Sa volonté. Résultat, un magnifique festin nous est parvenu des ponts supérieurs avant la fin du cycle. Nous en avons fait cadeau aux plus démunis. »
languages.original_text: "I met her once when I was young. The Vizsier saw a serpent hiding among those close to Domin'Theodora, ready to sink its fangs into her throat. I was ordered to find the serpent, and sever the soul from its body. I watched and waited for weeks. I hid among the shadows, the air ducts, and the faceless masses. Once I found the serpent, I sliced off its head and returned to the temple. I doubt that Domin'Theodora ever saw me. But the three ritual cuts I left behind on the body let her know that this death was pleasing to Him. They sent us a grand feast from the upper decks before the cycle's end. We gave it to the hungry."

languages.text: "Bir keresinde gençken tanışmıştım. Vezir, Domin'Theodora'nın yakındakiler arasında saklanan bir yılan olduğunu görmüştü. Domin'Theodora'nın gırtlağına dişlerini batırmaya hazırmış. Bana bu yılanı bulup ruhunu bedeninden ayırmam emredilmişti. Gölgelerde, hava borularında ve meçhul avamın arasında saklandım. Yılanı bulunca kellesini kesip tapınağa döndüm. Domin'Theodora beni görmemiştir bile. Ancak cesette bıraktığım üç ayin kesiği sayesinde bu ölümün O'nu memnun ettiğini öğrenmiş oldu. Döngünün sonuna gelmeden bize üst güvertelerden büyük bir ziyafet gönderdiler. Karnı açlara verdik."
languages.original_text: "I met her once when I was young. The Vizsier saw a serpent hiding among those close to Domin'Theodora, ready to sink its fangs into her throat.
